popup.noConversations: Start chatting to see history here.
popup.noBookmarks: Save bookmarks to see them here.
popup.noPinned: Pin important conversations to keep them handy.
popup.noActivity: Recent conversation edits, bookmarks, and exports will show up here.
popup.recentActivityDescription: Latest conversations, bookmarks, and exports at a glance.

options.heading: AI Companion Dashboard
options.description: Manage conversations, prompts, audio preferences, and sync settings in one place.
options.comingSoon: Detailed management views arrive in upcoming iterations.
options.exportDescription: Plan conversation backups via the background job queue.
options.exportJobsDescription: Track export retries and background processing.
options.conversationDescription: Latest chats captured from ChatGPT (stored locally).
options.conversationFilteredEmpty: No conversations match the current filters.
options.conversationFiltersDescription: Toggle filters with the bubbles to adjust folders, pin state, archive status, and sort order.
options.presetDescription: Save common filter combinations for quick reuse.
options.folderDescription: Organize chats by project, topic, or workflow.
options.folderEmpty: No folders yet. Create one to start grouping conversations.
options.bulkExportDescription: Choose a format to queue a download job for the selected conversations. The file will download when the job runs.
options.bulkExportScheduled: Export scheduled for {{count}} conversation. Track progress in the export queue.
options.bulkExportScheduled_plural: Export scheduled for {{count}} conversations. Track progress in the export queue.
options.bulkExportError: Export could not be scheduled. Try again.
options.gptFolderDescription: Pick, remove, or add GPT folders with the bubbles. The active choice applies to new entries.
options.gptDescription: Catalog reusable GPT configurations with descriptions and folders.
options.gptDescriptionPlaceholder: Short summary of the GPT purpose.
options.promptFolderDescription: Use the bubbles to choose where prompts live and to create or remove folders.
options.promptDescription: Draft and store reusable prompt snippets. Link them to GPTs for quick sequencing.
options.promptDescriptionPlaceholder: What this template is used for.
options.promptChainDescription: Sequence prompt templates to run repeatable workflows.
options.promptChainListDescription: Manage reusable prompt chains for complex sessions.
options.promptChainEmpty: No prompt chains yet. Create one to orchestrate templates.
options.promptChainHelper: Pick prompts on the left, then order the steps for your workflow.
options.promptChainAvailableDescription: Add prompts to the chain in the order you want to use them.
options.promptChainAvailableEmpty: All prompts are part of this chain.
options.promptChainStepsDescription: Reorder or remove prompts to refine the flow.
options.promptChainSelectedEmpty: Add at least one prompt to create a chain.
options.promptChainVariablesDescription: Name the placeholders this chain expects (max {{count}}).
options.promptChainVariablesEmpty: No variables yet. Add names like customerName or tone.
options.promptChainVariablesHelper: Variables may include letters, numbers, hyphen, or underscore.
options.promptChainVariablesErrorDuplicate: "{{name}}" is already part of this chain.
options.promptChainVariablesErrorTooMany: You can add up to {{count}} variables per chain.
options.promptChainVariablesErrorTooLong: Variable names must be 48 characters or fewer.
options.promptChainVariablesErrorEmpty: Enter a variable name before adding it.
options.promptChainVariablesErrorPattern: Start with a letter and use letters, numbers, hyphen, or underscore only.
options.sidebarDescription: Control the ChatGPT sidebar overlay from any surface.
options.sidebarToggleHelp: Toggle the floating sidebar in the ChatGPT interface.
options.promptFormDescription: Your folder, GPT link, and chains follow the bubble selections above.
options.promptChainBubbleHelper: Select an existing chain to edit or tap + to start a new sequence.

chains.title: Prompt chains
chains.emptySubtitle: Group prompts into chains in the dashboard to launch them here.

bookmarks.title: Conversation bookmarks
bookmarks.emptySubtitle: Bookmark ChatGPT messages to keep quick references handy in this bubble.

pinned.title: Pinned conversations
pinned.placeholderTitle: Quick pin controls on the way
pinned.placeholderSubtitle: Manage pins and favorite folders without leaving ChatGPT once this bubble unlocks.

actions.title: Actions & shortcuts
actions.placeholderSubtitle: This bubble will soon bundle quick operations like bookmarking, exporting, and sharing.

settings.title: Settings
settings.placeholderTitle: Adjust the Companion without leaving the chat
settings.placeholderSubtitle: Dock visibility, direction, and audio toggles will land in this bubble soon.

tabDescriptions.history: Save and pin chats directly from the conversation view. Table presets created here sync with the dashboard.
tabDescriptions.prompts: Build prompt chains inline, attach them to GPT folders, and reuse them across popup and options surfaces.
tabDescriptions.media: Voice overlays reuse the shared modal + overlay primitives to ensure consistent focus management and styling.

modal.title: Shared component library
modal.description: Modals, tabs, and overlays are rendered within a shadow root so styles do not collide with ChatGPT.
points: Keyboard shortcuts remain functional thanks to consistent escape handling.
All surfaces respect RTL layouts and localized labels from the shared i18n bundle.
Zustand domain stores hydrate content, popup, and options entries without prop drilling.

history.emptyPinned: Pin chats from ChatGPT to keep them handy.
history.emptyRecent: Start chatting to populate your history.
history.emptyBookmarks: Bookmark messages to keep quick references here.
history.folderShortcutsEmpty: Create folders in the dashboard to access them quickly here.
history.moveDialogDescriptionDefault: Select a destination folder for this conversation.
history.bookmarkModalDescription: Choose a message and add an optional note to store it in your bookmark bubble.
history.bookmarkModalConversationDescription: Save without linking to a specific message.
history.bookmarkModalNoMessages: No messages available yet. Send a prompt or wait for responses to appear.
history.bookmarkModalNotePlaceholder: Add context or reminders for this bookmark.
history.bookmarkModalUpdateInfo: Saving will update the note for this bookmark.
history.bookmarkModalCreateInfo: Notes help you remember why you saved the message.
history.bookmarkModalError: Failed to save bookmark. Please try again.
history.bookmarkModalRemoveError: Failed to remove bookmark. Please try again.
history.bookmarkModalLoadError: We could not load existing bookmarks. Try again later.
history.bookmarkModalNoConversation: Open a ChatGPT conversation to add bookmarks.
history.contextMenuNoText: Message has no text to reuse.
history.contextMenuError: We could not complete that action. Try again.
